conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D.
There are baffles positioned between the liquid sources and the containers.
Containers E, F, and G are located at the bottom of the image.
Liquid from A, B, C, and D will flow through the baffles and into one of the containers E, F, or G.
The baffles will direct the flow of liquid towards container F.
Final answer: The liquid will flow into container F.
